titles.title: A joint resolution to establish a Commission to develop and execute plans for the celebration of the one hundred and seventy-fifth anniversary of the Battle of Lake Erie, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.
Referred to Subcommittee on Census and Population.

committee.name: House Post Office and Civil Service
House Post Office and Civil Service

bill.summary: 2/24/1988--Introduced. Establishes the Battle of Lake Erie One Hundred and Seventy-fifth Anniversary Celebration Commission to develop plans for the celebration, in 1988, of the 175th anniversary of the Battle of Lake Erie. Requires all expenditures of the Commission to be made from donated funds. Sets forth reporting requirements and terminates the Commission upon submission of its report.
